Tunable.name: decay_days
Tunable.description: The number of days it will take for the global policy to revert to not-complete. Decay begins when the policy is completed.

TunableList.name: global_policy_effects
TunableList.description: Actions to apply when the global policy is enacted.

TunableTuple.name: bill_reduction
TunableTuple.description: An effect that, when turned on, modifies the bill amount for all households by the tuned percentage.

TunableTuple.name: percent_reduction
TunableTuple.description: A mapping of bill reduction reason to percent reduction. Reasons for bill reduction can be added to sims.bills tuning.

Tunable.name: reduction_amount
Tunable.description: Percent by which all household bills are reduced.

TunableTuple.name: shut_off_utilities
TunableTuple.description: An effect that when turned on, uses the tuned weekly schedule to have a daily chance to turn off and on the tuned utility.

TunableVariant.name: chance
TunableVariant.description: The percent chance that, after an effect is turned on, that utility will turn off day-to-day.

TunableTuple.name: schedule_data
TunableTuple.description: The information to schedule points during the week that the Global Policy Effect, if enacted, will turn off the tuned utility.

TunableList.name: schedule_entries
TunableList.description: A list of event schedules. Each event is a mapping of days of the week to a start_time and duration.

TunableTuple.description: A schedule. Define availability for days of the week. For the set of specified days, define an hour of the day and a duration, in hours. Optionally, specified if the start time is random within the tuned window.

TunableTuple.name: days_available
TunableTuple.description: Which days of the week to include

Tunable.name: duration
Tunable.description: Duration of this work session in hours.

TunableVariant.name: multi_day_career_days_at_work
TunableVariant.display: Multi Day Career Days At Work
TunableVariant.description: This tunable should only be used with multi-day rabbitholes. If you are not sure about whether this should be used for the career you are tuning, please check with your GPE partner. Set the days the Sim should be at their multi-day career here. Used for setting values in UI.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: Which days of the week to include

TunableVariant.name: multi_day_career_start_and_end_days
TunableVariant.display: Multi Day Career Start And End Days
TunableVariant.description: This tunable should only be used with multi-day rabbitholes. If you are not sure about whether this should be used for the career you are tuning, please check with your GPE partner. Used to tell the UI which days the multi-day career starts and ends on.

TunableEnum.name: end_day
TunableEnum.description: The day the multi-day career ends.

TunableEnum.name: start_day
TunableEnum.description: The day the multi-day career starts.

Tunable.name: random_start
Tunable.description: If checked, this schedule will have a random start time in the tuned window each time.

TunableEnum.name: schedule_shift_type
TunableEnum.description: Shift Type for the schedule, this will be used for validations.

TunableTuple.name: start_time
TunableTuple.description: An Hour(24Hr) and Minute representing a time relative to the beginning of a day.

TunableList.name: utilities
TunableList.description: A list of utilities to shut off.

TunableTuple.description: A modifier for shutting off a household utility.

TunableEnum.name: shutoff_reason
TunableEnum.description: The priority of our shutoff reason. This determines how important the shutoff tooltip is relative to other reasons the utility is being shutoff.

Tunable.name: shutoff_tooltip
Tunable.description: A tooltip to show when an interaction cannot be run due to this utility being shutoff.

TunableEnum.name: utility
TunableEnum.description: The household utility we want to modify.

TunableList.name: loot_on_complete
TunableList.description: A list of loot actions that will be run when the policy is complete.

Tunable.description: The loot action will target the active Sim.

TunableList.name: loot_on_decay
TunableList.description: A list of loot actions that will be run when the policy decays.

Tunable.description: The loot action will target the active Sim.

Tunable.name: progress_initial_value
Tunable.description: The initial value of global policy progress. Progress begins when the policy is first set to in-progress.

Tunable.name: progress_max_value
Tunable.description: The max value of global policy progress. Once the policy progress reaches the max threshold, global policy state becomes complete.
